timeline.message:
Minor code improvements; Added nullness annotations to ThingActions and ThingHandlerService

timeline.author: cweitkamp

replies.bodyText: Note sure. Going for @Nullable leaves us more flexibility wrt lifecyle - who knows, if we come across a situation, where it is valid to have no thingHandler available.
replies.author: kaikreuzer
